overview: Leo is a middle-aged writer of popular romantic novels who writes under a pseudonym, but despises her own work. At home, her husband, who works overseas, is distant both physically and emotionally. As she reevaluates her life and writing, Leo is led to an unexpected relationship with Angel, a sensitive newspaper editor.
cast: Marisa Paredes|Juan Echanove|Carme Elias|Rossy de Palma|Chus Lampreave
